tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_satisfaction_survey_data (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    benefits_feedback TEXT,
    improvement_suggestions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_details (
	emp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	department VARCHAR(50),
	age INT,
	salary INT
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeData (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    job_title VARCHAR(100),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
    response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    survey_date DATE,
    q1_rating INT,
    q2_rating INT,
    q3_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE BenefitPackages (
    package_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    package_name VARCHAR(255),
    health_insurance VARCHAR(100),
    retirement_plan VARCHAR(100),
    vacation_days INT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    department TEXT,
    salary DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    type TEXT,
    question TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    answer TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE benefits (
    benefit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    benefit_name TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    hire_date DATE,
    salary DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_date DATE,
    survey_type VARCHAR(255),
    survey_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    response_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE benefits (
    benefit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    benefit_name VARCHAR(255),
    benefit_type VARCHAR(255),
    benefit_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    benefit_id INT,
    rating_score INT
)
